info.official_title: Phase I Dose Escalation and Pharmacokinetics Clinical Trial of Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome in Children With Relapsed and Refractory Lymphoma and Solid Tumors

identified_line.line: * 1. Subjects fully understand and voluntarily participate in this study and sign the informed consent form (ICF);

criterions.exact_snippets: Subjects fully understand
voluntarily participate in this study
sign the informed consent form (ICF)

identified_line.line: * 2. 2-21 years old;

criterions.exact_snippets: 2-21 years old

identified_line.line: * 3. Expected survival ≥ 3 months;

criterions.exact_snippets: Expected survival ≥ 3 months

identified_line.line: * 4. Subjects with histologically confirmed diagnosis of relapsed and refractory lymphoma and solid tumors, which is one of the following subtypes:

criterions.exact_snippets: histologically confirmed diagnosis of relapsed and refractory lymphoma
histologically confirmed diagnosis of ... solid tumors

and_criteria.exact_snippets: histologically confirmed diagnosis of relapsed and refractory lymphoma
histologically confirmed diagnosis of ... solid tumors

identified_line.line: 1. Lymphoblastic lymphoma

criterions.exact_snippets: Lymphoblastic lymphoma

identified_line.line: 2. Anaplastic large T cell lymphoma

criterions.exact_snippets: Anaplastic large T cell lymphoma

identified_line.line: 3. Burkitt's lymphoma

criterions.exact_snippets: Burkitt's lymphoma

identified_line.line: 4. Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma

criterions.exact_snippets: Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma

identified_line.line: 5. Peripheral T, NK/T cell lymphoma

criterions.exact_snippets: Peripheral T, NK/T cell lymphoma

identified_line.line: 6. Soft tissue sarcoma

criterions.exact_snippets: Soft tissue sarcoma

identified_line.line: 7. Neuroblastoma

criterions.exact_snippets: Neuroblastoma

identified_line.line: 8. Other subtypes of lymphoma or solid tumors that the investigators believe can be included

criterions.exact_snippets: Other subtypes of lymphoma or solid tumors
criterions.criterion: subtypes of lymphoma or solid tumors

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Other subtypes of lymphoma or solid tumors
and_criteria.criterion: subtypes of lymphoma or solid tumors

identified_line.line: * 5. Relapsed lymphoma is defined as the lymphoma that relapse after obtaining complete response (CR) after initial chemotherapy; Refractory lymphoma subjects meet one of the following conditions: 1) The tumor shrinks <50% or disease progression after 4 cycles of standard chemotherapy,; 2) CR after standard chemotherapy, but relapse within half a year; 3) 2 or more relapses after CR; 4) relapse after hematopoietic stem cell transplantation;

criterions.exact_snippets: Relapsed lymphoma is defined as the lymphoma that relapse after obtaining complete response (CR) after initial chemotherapy

requirement.expected_value: relapse after obtaining complete response (CR) after initial chemotherapy

criterions.exact_snippets: Refractory lymphoma subjects meet one of the following conditions: 1) The tumor shrinks <50% or disease progression after 4 cycles of standard chemotherapy
Refractory lymphoma subjects meet one of the following conditions: 1) The tumor shrinks <50% or disease progression after 4 cycles of standard chemotherapy
Refractory lymphoma subjects meet one of the following conditions: ... 2) CR after standard chemotherapy, but relapse within half a year

requirement.expected_value: within half a year after CR following standard chemotherapy

criterions.exact_snippets: Refractory lymphoma subjects meet one of the following conditions: ... 3) 2 or more relapses after CR
Refractory lymphoma subjects meet one of the following conditions: ... 3) 2 or more relapses after CR
Refractory lymphoma subjects meet one of the following conditions: ... 4) relapse after hematopoietic stem cell transplantation

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Relapsed lymphoma is defined as the lymphoma that relapse after obtaining complete response (CR) after initial chemotherapy

requirement.expected_value: relapse after obtaining complete response (CR) after initial chemotherapy

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Refractory lymphoma subjects meet one of the following conditions: 1) The tumor shrinks <50% or disease progression after 4 cycles of standard chemotherapy
Refractory lymphoma subjects meet one of the following conditions: 1) The tumor shrinks <50% or disease progression after 4 cycles of standard chemotherapy
Refractory lymphoma subjects meet one of the following conditions: ... 2) CR after standard chemotherapy, but relapse within half a year

requirement.expected_value: within half a year after CR following standard chemotherapy

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Refractory lymphoma subjects meet one of the following conditions: ... 3) 2 or more relapses after CR
Refractory lymphoma subjects meet one of the following conditions: ... 3) 2 or more relapses after CR
Refractory lymphoma subjects meet one of the following conditions: ... 4) relapse after hematopoietic stem cell transplantation

identified_line.line: * 6. Lymphoma subjects must have at least one evaluable or measurable lesion per lugano2014 criteria: for lymph node lesions, the length should be > 1.5cm; For non-lymph node lesions, the length should be > 1.0cm;

criterions.exact_snippets: Lymphoma subjects must have at least one evaluable or measurable lesion per lugano2014 criteria
for lymph node lesions, the length should be > 1.5cm
For non-lymph node lesions, the length should be > 1.0cm

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Lymphoma subjects must have at least one evaluable or measurable lesion per lugano2014 criteria

or_criteria.exact_snippets: for lymph node lesions, the length should be > 1.5cm
For non-lymph node lesions, the length should be > 1.0cm

identified_line.line: * 7. Solid tumors must have tumor lesions measurable by CT or MRI;

criterions.exact_snippets: Solid tumors must have tumor lesions measurable by CT or MRI

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Solid tumors must have tumor lesions measurable by CT or MRI

identified_line.line: * 8. ECOG Performance Status: 0-2;

criterions.exact_snippets: ECOG Performance Status: 0-2

identified_line.line: * 9. Bone marrow function: Absolute neutrophil count ≥1.5×109/L, Platelet count ≥75×109/L, Hemoglobin ≥ 80g/L (Absolute neutrophil can be relaxed to ≥ 1.0×109/L, Platelet count can be relaxed to ≥50×109/L, Hemoglobin can be relaxed to ≥75 g/L in subjects with poor bone-marrow reserve);

criterions.exact_snippets: Absolute neutrophil count ≥1.5×109/L ... can be relaxed to ≥ 1.0×109/L
Absolute neutrophil count ≥1.5×109/L ... can be relaxed to ≥ 1.0×109/L
Platelet count ≥75×109/L ... can be relaxed to ≥50×109/L
Platelet count ≥75×109/L ... can be relaxed to ≥50×109/L
Hemoglobin ≥ 80g/L ... can be relaxed to ≥75 g/L
Hemoglobin ≥ 80g/L ... can be relaxed to ≥75 g/L

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Absolute neutrophil count ≥1.5×109/L ... can be relaxed to ≥ 1.0×109/L
Platelet count ≥75×109/L ... can be relaxed to ≥50×109/L
Hemoglobin ≥ 80g/L ... can be relaxed to ≥75 g/L
Absolute neutrophil count ≥1.5×109/L ... can be relaxed to ≥ 1.0×109/L
Platelet count ≥75×109/L ... can be relaxed to ≥50×109/L
Hemoglobin ≥ 80g/L ... can be relaxed to ≥75 g/L

identified_line.line: Must have minimum age of 2 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: minimum age of 2 Years

identified_line.line: Must have maximum age of 21 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: maximum age of 21 Years

identified_line.line: * 1. The subject had previously received any of the following anti-tumor treatments:

criterions.exact_snippets: previously received any of the following anti-tumor treatments

not_criteria.exact_snippets: previously received any of the following anti-tumor treatments

identified_line.line: 1. Subjects who have been treated with mitoxantrone or mitoxantrone liposomes;

criterions.exact_snippets: treated with mitoxantrone
treated with ... mitoxantrone liposomes

identified_line.line: 2. Previously received doxorubicin or other anthracycline treatment, and the total cumulative dose of doxorubicin was more than 360 mg/m2 (1 mg doxorubicin equivalent to 2 mg epirubicin);

criterions.exact_snippets: Previously received doxorubicin or other anthracycline treatment
total cumulative dose of doxorubicin was more than 360 mg/m2

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Previously received doxorubicin or other anthracycline treatment
total cumulative dose of doxorubicin was more than 360 mg/m2

identified_line.line: 3. Subjects who received anti-tumor treatment (including chemotherapy, targeted therapy, glucocorticoid, traditional Chinese medicine with anti-tumor activity, etc.) or participated in other clinical trials and received trial drugs;

criterions.exact_snippets: Subjects who received anti-tumor treatment (including chemotherapy, targeted therapy, glucocorticoid, traditional Chinese medicine with anti-tumor activity, etc.)
participated in other clinical trials and received trial drugs

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Subjects who received anti-tumor treatment (including chemotherapy, targeted therapy, glucocorticoid, traditional Chinese medicine with anti-tumor activity, etc.)
participated in other clinical trials and received trial drugs

identified_line.line: 4. Subjects who received autologous hematopoietic stem cell transplantation within 100 days after the first medication or allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation.

criterions.exact_snippets: autologous hematopoietic stem cell transplantation within 100 days after the first medication
allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation

and_criteria.exact_snippets: autologous hematopoietic stem cell transplantation within 100 days after the first medication

identified_line.line: * 2. Hypersensitivity to any study drug or its components;

criterions.exact_snippets: Hypersensitivity to any study drug or its components

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Hypersensitivity to any study drug or its components

identified_line.line: * 3. Uncontrolled systemic diseases (such as active infection, uncontrolled hypertension, diabetes, etc.);

criterions.exact_snippets: Uncontrolled systemic diseases (such as active infection, uncontrolled hypertension, diabetes, etc.)

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Uncontrolled systemic diseases (such as active infection, uncontrolled hypertension, diabetes, etc.)

identified_line.line: * 4. Heart function and disease meet one of the following conditions:

criterions.exact_snippets: Heart function and disease

requirement.expected_value: meet one of the following conditions
meet one of the following conditions

identified_line.line: 1. Long QTc syndrome or QTc interval > 480 ms;

criterions.exact_snippets: Long QTc syndrome
QTc interval > 480 ms

identified_line.line: 2. Complete left bundle branch block, grade II or III atrioventricular block;

criterions.exact_snippets: Complete left bundle branch block
grade II or III atrioventricular block

or_criteria.exact_snippets: grade II or III atrioventricular block

identified_line.line: 3. Serious and uncontrolled arrhythmias requiring drug treatment;

criterions.exact_snippets: Serious and uncontrolled arrhythmias requiring drug treatment
Serious and uncontrolled arrhythmias requiring drug treatment
Serious and uncontrolled arrhythmias requiring drug treatment

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Serious and uncontrolled arrhythmias requiring drug treatment
Serious and uncontrolled arrhythmias requiring drug treatment
Serious and uncontrolled arrhythmias requiring drug treatment

identified_line.line: 4. New York Heart Association grade ≥ III;

criterions.exact_snippets: New York Heart Association grade ≥ III

not_criteria.exact_snippets: New York Heart Association grade ≥ III

identified_line.line: 5. Cardiac ejection fraction (LVEF)< 50%;

criterions.exact_snippets: Cardiac ejection fraction (LVEF)< 50%

identified_line.line: 6. A history of myocardial infarction, unstable angina pectoris, severe unstable ventricular arrhythmia or any other arrhythmia requiring treatment, a history of clinically serious pericardial disease, or ECG evidence of acute ischemia or active conduction system abnormalities within 6 months before recruitment.

criterions.exact_snippets: A history of myocardial infarction
unstable angina pectoris
severe unstable ventricular arrhythmia
any other arrhythmia requiring treatment
a history of clinically serious pericardial disease
ECG evidence of acute ischemia
active conduction system abnormalities
within 6 months before recruitment

and_criteria.exact_snippets: a history of clinically serious pericardial disease

identified_line.line: * 6. Human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection (HIV antibody positive);

criterions.exact_snippets: Human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection (HIV antibody positive)

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection (HIV antibody positive)

identified_line.line: * 7. Subjects with other malignant tumors past or present (except for non-melanoma skin basal cell carcinoma, breast/cervical carcinoma in control, and other malignant tumors that have been effectively controlled without treatment within the past five years);

criterions.exact_snippets: Subjects with other malignant tumors past or present
except for non-melanoma skin basal cell carcinoma
except for ... breast/cervical carcinoma in control
except for ... other malignant tumors that have been effectively controlled without treatment within the past five years

requirement.expected_value: effectively controlled without treatment within the past five years

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Subjects with other malignant tumors past or present

not_criteria.exact_snippets: except for non-melanoma skin basal cell carcinoma
except for ... breast/cervical carcinoma in control
except for ... other malignant tumors that have been effectively controlled without treatment within the past five years

requirement.expected_value: effectively controlled without treatment within the past five years

identified_line.line: * 8. Subjects suffering from primary or secondary central nervous system (CNS) lymphoma or a history of CNS lymphoma at the time of recruitment;

criterions.exact_snippets: primary or secondary central nervous system (CNS) lymphoma
history of CNS lymphoma
criterions.criterion: history of central nervous system (CNS) lymphoma

or_criteria.exact_snippets: primary or secondary central nervous system (CNS) lymphoma

or_criteria.criterion: history of central nervous system (CNS) lymphoma

identified_line.line: * 9. Pregnant and lactating women and childbearing age patients unwilling to take contraceptive measures;

criterions.exact_snippets: Pregnant
lactating women
childbearing age patients
unwilling to take contraceptive measures

identified_line.line: * 10. Unsuitable subjects for this study determined by the investigator.

criterions.exact_snippets: Unsuitable subjects for this study determined by the investigator

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Unsuitable subjects for this study determined by the investigator

identified_line.line: * 5. Hepatitis B and hepatitis C active infection (plus HBV DNA if one positive for hepatitis B surface antigen or core antibody and HBV DNA more than 1×103 copy/mL excluded; plus HCV RNA if hepatitis C antibody positive and HCV RNA more than 1×103 copy/mL exclude);

criterions.exact_snippets: Hepatitis B ... active infection
Hepatitis C active infection
HBV DNA ... more than 1×103 copy/mL
HCV RNA ... more than 1×103 copy/mL

identified_line.line: * 10. Liver and kidney function: serum creatinine ≤ 1.5×ULN (upper limit of normal); AST and ALT ≤ 2.5×ULN (≤ 5×ULN for subjects with liver metastases); total bilirubin ≤ 1.5×ULN (≤ 3×ULN for subjects with liver metastases).

criterions.exact_snippets: serum creatinine ≤ 1.5×ULN
AST and ALT ≤ 2.5×ULN (≤ 5×ULN for subjects with liver metastases)
total bilirubin ≤ 1.5×ULN (≤ 3×ULN for subjects with liver metastases)

identified_line.line: Healthy volunteers allowed

criterions.exact_snippets: Healthy volunteers allowed
